column1: Weighted MRI image size (256, 256, 1) in T2, depicting the head of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section n°4 beginning from the back of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 154.2480 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1404.0527 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 168.7500 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 953.1738 mm³.
